name: nasa-environmental-game
description: NASA Space Apps Challenge - Environmental Restoration Game with Real-time Satellite Data

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.db:setup: cd backend && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const db = require('./db'); const sql = fs.readFileSync('./database.sql', 'utf8'); db.query(sql).then(() => { console.log('Database setup complete'); process.exit(0); }).catch(err => { console.error('Database setup failed:', err); process.exit(1); });"
